text.en: Namo guru ānanda-bhadrāya!2
All-knowing and wholly virtuous in your activity,
text.en-trans: künkhyen küntu gewé trinlé chen

text.en: All-seeing and perfect, the buddha who prophesied you,
text.en-trans: künzik dzoksang gyé kyi lungten nyé

text.en: All-illuminating sun of the tradition of Kunga Nyingpo,
text.en-trans: kün ga nyingpö ringluk nyinmor jé

text.en: All-perfect Vajradhara, Kunga Zangpo, to you I pray.3
text.en-trans: kunzang dorjé chang la solwa deb

text.en: With unimpeded access to a treasury of oceanic sūtras and tantras,
text.en-trans: dogyü gyatsö terdzö chaktok dral

text.en: You are the Lion of Speech who sees all the infinite objects of knowledge,
text.en-trans: rabjam sheja künzik mawé seng

text.en: The Lord of Compassion, who holds a white lotus in his hand,
text.en-trans: nyingjé wangchuk chak na pekar chang

text.en: And the Vajra-Wielding Keeper of Secrets—to you I pray.4
text.en-trans: sang dzin lak na dorjér solwa deb

text.en: With inexhaustible intelligence, free from delusion’s stain,
text.en-trans: trulpé dridral lodrö mizepé

text.en: You constantly voiced the melody of Mahāyāna Dharma
text.en-trans: tekchen chö kyi drayang taktu drok

text.en: And drew forth a great river of the four classes of tantra—
text.en-trans: gyüdé nam zhi chulung chenpo dren

text.en: To the bringer of ripening and liberation to the fortunate, I pray.
text.en-trans: kalden mindrol dzé la solwa deb

text.en: To the one who brought maturity through the four empowerments,
text.en-trans: khyepar birwé tuk chü sung ngak gi

text.en: The foundational maṇḍala of Virūpa’s essential instructions, in particular,
text.en-trans: ten gyi kyilkhor wang zhi min dzé né

text.en: And established all at the supreme level of the four kāyas—
text.en-trans: ku zhi gopang chok la gö dzepa

text.en: Guru Hevajra, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lama gyé dzé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: Within the mansion of exalted discipline and renunciation,
text.en-trans: ngejung pakpé tsultrim khang zang du

text.en: You are the noble one whose view and conduct are utterly pure,
text.en-trans: tachö nampar dakpé kyebu ni

text.en: Lord Ngorchen, Śākyamuni’s representative in the North—
text.en-trans: jangchok tubpé gyaltsab ngor chen jer

text.en: With great, unshakeable devotion, I pray to you.
text.en-trans: miché güpa chenpö solwa deb

text.en: As soon as we fortunate ones are touched by the crystalline moon-rays
text.en-trans: palden lamé tukjé jinlab kyi

text.en: Of the compassionate blessings of this glorious guru,
text.en-trans: da shel dütsi sarpé rekpé mö

text.en: May the jasmine flower of our longevity and intelligence bloom,
text.en-trans: kalzang tsé dang lo yi kunda zhé

text.en: And may we be protected from all forms of adversity and decline.
text.en-trans: mitün güpa kün lé kyab tu sol

text.en: From this moment on and throughout all our lives to come,
text.en-trans: di né zung té tserab tamché du

text.en: May we find the freedoms and advantages, purely maintain the three sets of vows,
text.en-trans: daljor ten nyé dom sum nampar dak

text.en: And spontaneously accomplish a vast ocean of benefit for both ourselves and others,
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi gyatso lhün gyi drub

text.en: And all be auspicious for the teachings to flourish throughout the ten directions!
text.en-trans: tenpa chok chur pelwé tashi shok
